criteria.desc: Netlist structure matches a single-ended cascode with gain-boost loops on both NMOS and PMOS sides (aux amplifiers biasing cascode gates; main path: NMOS input → NMOS cascode → vout; PMOS cascode/load above vout).
Explicitly mentions cascode and gain-boost (or gain-boosted) in a single-ended OTA.
Avoids high-swing and folded claims; not fully differential or two-stage.
